focus: Integrated applyAuditRecommendations into category proposal flow
notes: S0071 completed integration of applyAuditRecommendations(). Changes: (1) Added auditIssues parameter to generateCategoryProposalWithAI() function signature, (2) Extract topIssues from audit.reportJson in generateCategoryProposal action, (3) Call applyAuditRecommendations() after buildProposedStructure() to apply AI recommendations like 'move to description' and 'add skin type info'. TypeScript compiles. User should re-run audit to see AI recommendations being applied automatically.
